hibernate-mapping.sql-query: insert into EO_DELIVERY_ITEM (EODI_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, REC_VER, REC_STATUS, ORG_ID, PM_CODE, EODI_WORK_ORDER_NO, EODI_CODE, EODI_NAME, EODI_PACKAGE_TYPE_CODE, EODI_PACKAGE_TYPE_NAME, EODI_PACKAGE_UNIT_CODE, EODI_PACKAGE_UNIT_NAME, EODI_ITEM_TYPE_CODE, EODI_ITEM_TYPE_NAME, EODI_PACKAGE_QUANTITY, EODI_QUANTITY, EODI_GROSS_WEIGHT, EODI_NET_WEIGHT, EODI_VOLUME, EODI_LOT_NO, EODI_PRICE, EODI_AMOUNT, EODI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_CODE, EODI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_NAME, EODI_TEMPERATURE_FM, EODI_TEMPERATURE_TO, EODI_REMARK) select SEQ_EO_DELIVERY_ITEM.NEXTVAL, /*EODI_ID*/ EOWI.CREATOR, /*CREATOR*/ SYSDATE, /*CREATE_TIME*/ EOWI.MODIFIER, /*MODIFIER*/ SYSDATE, /*MODIFY_TIME*/ 0, /*REC_VER*/ 0, /*REC_STATUS*/ EOWI.ORG_ID, /*ORG_ID*/ EOWI.PM_CODE, /*PM_CODE*/ EOWI.EOWI_WORK_ORDER_NO, /*EODI_WORK_ORDER_NO*/ EOWI.EOWI_CODE, EOWI.EOWI_NAME, EOWI.EOWI_PACKAGE_TYPE_CODE, EOWI.EOWI_PACKAGE_TYPE_NAME, EOWI.EOWI_PACKAGE_UNIT_CODE, EOWI.EOWI_PACKAGE_UNIT_NAME, EOWI.EOWI_ITEM_TYPE_CODE, EOWI.EOWI_ITEM_TYPE_NAME, EOWI.EOWI_PACKAGE_QUANTITY, EOWI.EOWI_QUANTITY, EOWI.EOWI_GROSS_WEIGHT, EOWI.EOWI_NET_WEIGHT, EOWI.EOWI_VOLUME, EOWI.EOWI_LOT_NO, EOWI.EOWI_PRICE, EOWI.EOWI_AMOUNT, EOWI.EOWI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_CODE, EOWI.EOWI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_NAME, EOWI.EOWI_TEMPERATURE_FM, EOWI.EOWI_TEMPERATURE_TO, EOWI.EOWI_REMARK from EO_WORK_ITEM EOWI where EOWI.EOWI_WORK_ORDER_NO = :eowoWorkOrderNo and EOWI.ORG_ID = :orgId
